ACB44DFE49787C625648C9A2AE9B1CEF: Crackling rollers whose electric shells are highly prized by the Ninja. Drawn to the power of LIGHTNING, these creatures can be found during rainy or stormy weather.
CEB2F4D1415D1D4231D1F4BFC403BCC7: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the ELEMENTS locked within.
